rules_text:
Create a 1/1 black Spirit creature token with flying for each creature card and Revelation card in your graveyard.
Coalesce {6}{G}{W}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{G}{W}{U}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
